item.title: No title
item.description: Merchandise is one of the ultimate ways to show your love for a game. It’s an obsession to find that thing that represents a banner of appreciation for the pixelated warmth in your heart. In the following piece I’m going to tell you why you should care about Give to the Maker.

item.title: No title
item.description: I often tell people about my business, some people think that it’s cool, some people don’t care or don’t get it and some people think that it’s good but why wouldn’t developers just do it for themselves. What can you possibly offer? Connections in the gaming industry? Nope. Money? WHERE!?! QUICK SHOW ME WHERE IT IS!! So I figured the natural step is to write about my viewpoint on this argument.
